response.overview: With Ran, legendary director Akira Kurosawa reimagines Shakespeare's King Lear as a singular historical epic set in sixteenth-century Japan. Majestic in scope, the film is Kurosawa's late-life masterpiece, a profound examination of the folly of war and the crumbling of one family under the weight of betrayal, greed, and the insatiable thirst for power.
response.tagline: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
response.title: Ran

release_dates.note: New York Film Festival / Restored 4K version

results.name: RAN - New Trailer - Restored in Stunning 4K - In Cinemas April 1
